shape

Class CarShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape.CarShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoveableShape

    public class CarShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoveableShape
    A car that can be moved around a JFrame using the CarShape's translate(int, int) method. This is a modified version of the books CarShape class.
    Author:
    Andrew Markley, Cory W. Cordell

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CarShape(int x, int y, int width, int speedBonus)
      Constructs a CarShape with a random color.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarShape

        public CarShape(int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int speedBonus)
        Constructs a CarShape with a random color.
        Parameters:
        x - the left of the bounding rectangle
        y - the top of the bounding rectangle
        width - the width of the bounding rectangle
        speedBonus - value to use as the velocity increment, calculated using a slope formula to normalize vehicle speed based on the lane the vehicle is driving on.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        dx - the amount to translate in x-direction
        dy - the amount to translate in y-direction
